question_text: Which of the following are characteristics of loopback plugs used for network troubleshooting? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: They simulate a complete Ethernet link
They enable local testing without remote equipment
They generate traffic patterns for bandwidth testing
They connect transmit pins directly to receive pins
correct_answer: They enable local testing without remote equipment
They connect transmit pins directly to receive pins
explanation: Loopback plugs are passive tools that connect output to input, allowing for self-test of port circuitry without the need for external power or remote devices.
